Package com.yardi.shared.userServices

package com.yardi.shared.userServices
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    InitialPage
    Key/value representation of the list of the users initial pages based on the group(s) that the user belongs to.
    LoginInitialPage
    Key/value representation of the list of the users initial pages based on the group(s) that the user belongs to.
    LoginRequest
    Container for login credentials supplied by the user.

    PasswordAuthentication
    https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2860943/how-can-i-hash-a-password-in-java Hash passwords for storage, and test passwords against password tokens.
    PasswordStatistics
    Several password rules rely on scanning the password as a char [] to determine whether the password contains upper case, lower case, etc.
